snippet.title: Desk Deck Heroes - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Dip your pen in the company ink with this card-based adventure game. Find heroes, assemble a powerful party, and get ready to fill your weekdays with battles and quests!

Discover the world of Born of Bread for the first time or dive back in! Desk Deck Heroes is a roguelite deckbuilder with elements from management sims and dating sims! Manage the party’s funds and build a relationship with your favorite heroes.​

Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2933240/Desk_Deck_Heroes/

Follow us for more info!
Twitter - https://twitter.com/wildartsdevs
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@wildartsdevs
